Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

LeakDetection.description: The LeakDetection schema contains definitions for reporting leaks in liquid cooling systems or other equipment.
LeakDetection.longDescription: This resource shall represent the leak detection functionality present in a service for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

LeakDetectorGroups.description: The groups of leak detection equipment.
LeakDetectorGroups.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of leak detection groups.

LeakDetectors.description: The link to the collection of leak detectors within this subsystem.
LeakDetectors.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type LeakDetectorCollection.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

LeakDetectorGroup.description: A group of leak detection equipment.
LeakDetectorGroup.longDescription: This object shall contain a group of leak detection equipment that reports a unified status.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Detectors.description: The leak detection states from all related leak detection devices in this group.
Detectors.longDescription: This property shall contain the states of all leak detection devices in this detector group.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type LeakDetector.

GroupName.description: The name of this leak detector group.
GroupName.longDescription: This property shall contain the name used to describe this group of leak detectors and related equipment.

HumidityPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain the humidity, in percent units, for this resource.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Humidity`.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #LeakDetection.v1_0_0.LeakDetection
